definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: At the same time, short-term traders bought to reverse bets that stock prices would fall.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，短線交易員逆市買入，押注股價回升。

sentences.english: On the operation, the space continues to hold, days short on high short.
sentences.chinese: 操作上，空單繼續持有，日內短線逢高做空爲主。

sentences.english: It is a best remake of famous game "Short Line".
sentences.chinese: 這是一個最好的重拍著名的遊戲“短線”。

sentences.english: Recommends that investors cautious on the high side, short-term actions.
sentences.chinese: 建議投資者思路謹慎偏多，短線操作。

sentences.english: This fee type is set primarily to discourage short-term investors.
sentences.chinese: 設立贖回費首要目的在於阻止投資者短線炒賣。

sentences.english: Because the short-term advantage vacates , after this, city short line or has the space.
sentences.chinese: 由於短期利空出完，該股後市短線或有空間。

sentences.english: Is your business seasonal or cyclical?
sentences.chinese: 你的公司是短線或長線經營？

sentences.english: The lack of transparency from Apple creates a perfect storm for short-term traders.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果的諱莫如深爲短線交易者帶來了一場完美風暴。

sentences.english: But I don't try to predict short- or even medium-term moves in the market.
sentences.chinese: 但我並不想預測市場短線甚至是中線的走勢。

sentences.english: Daily headlines are less important than long-term trends.
sentences.chinese: 短線消息的重要性不及長期趨勢。

sentences.english: Both are favored tools among short-term traders such as hedge funds and day traders.
sentences.chinese: 對沖基金和短線交易員都青睞這兩種投資工具。

sentences.english: The use of funds in short - term operation, not all -out warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 短線操作在資金運用上，不能全倉進出。

sentences.english: Action was suggested built much lower days every single, mainly short-term trading.
sentences.chinese: 操作上建議日內逢低建多單，短線交易爲主。

sentences.english: Brush-off short line, gave up centerline.
sentences.chinese: 拒絕了短線，放棄了中線。

sentences.english: Note that on each side of the control there are either lines or stubs.
sentences.chinese: 請注意該控件的每一側上均有線條或短線。

sentences.english: Another lesson is to stay away from scalping.
sentences.chinese: 另一個教訓就是不要做短線。
